input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Magic Metal Polished Quartz Bullet Black Crystal Necklace Druzy Mystic Boho Pendant Silver Tone NN30 Fashion Jewelry

Product specifications:
Ships from the USA
Black Quartz Crystal Set in a Silver Tone Empty Bullet Casing.
Crystal Pendant Measures 2 inches. Chain Laying Flat measures 30 inches.
Makes a perfect gift.
Search Magic Metal Jewelry for more jewelry styles.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Are you looking for a unique and stylish way to show off your boho chic? This Magic Metal Polished Quartz Bullet Black Crystal Necklace Druzy Mystic Boho Pendant Silver Tone NN30 Fashion Jewelry is sure to do the trick. This stunning piece features a black quartz crystal set in a silver-tone empty bullet casing, making it the perfect accessory for those who want to make a statement.
Measuring 2 inches in length, and 30 inches when laid flat, this crystal pendant makes a perfect gift for yourself or a loved one. Whether you're looking for a way to add a touch of sparkle to your look, or you're searching for a unique gift, this necklace is sure to impress. And remember, we have many other jewelry styles available, so be sure to search Magic Metal Jewelry for more!
input_text.Response B: Looking for some magic in your life?  This crystal necklace is perfect for your everyday jewelry collection.  This crystal pendant is set in a silver tone empty bullet casing. It measures 2 inches and is hanging on a 30 inch silver tone chain. This crystal pendant makes a great gift for anyone who loves fashion style jewelry. It is also a great way to add some bling to your favorite T-Shirt. Search Magic Metal Jewelry for more styles of crystal necklaces.
